access: Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Etheric Essence Disruptor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1110)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Gadget" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=405" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents have access to all uncommon clockwork items and gadgets from Chapters 1 and 2 of this book_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access**  Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An etheric essence disruptor emits bursts of discordant ethereal energy through a process based upon Stasian etheric-spirit singers, though without the need for a Stasian coil. Etheric essence disruptors attempt to break down the workings of a spell that manipulates spiritual essence. Upon activation, attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) an active [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) or [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 30 feet, the counteract modifier is +7, and the counteract level is 2.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 40 feet, the counteract modifier is +13, and the counteract level is 4.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 60 feet, the counteract modifier is +18, and the counteract level is 6.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 90 feet, the counteract modifier is +24, and the counteract level is 8.
name: Etheric Essence Disruptor (Greater)
